title: Nationwide surveillance and characterization of the third-generation cephalosporin-resistant Salmonella enterica serovar infantis isolated from chickens in South Korea between 2010 and 2022
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Hee-Seung Kang, Md Sekendar Ali, Seok-Hyeon Na, Bo-Youn Moon, Ji-In Kim, Yu-Jeong Hwang, Soon Seek Yoon, Seung-Chun Park, Suk-Kyung Lim
